title: Ethics in AI
description: Understanding fairness, bias, privacy, and ethical challenges of AI in finance.

sections.heading: What is Ethics?
sections.text: Ethics refers to principles ensuring fairness, transparency, and privacy in AI systems.

sections.heading: Why Ethics Matter
sections.text: AI influences critical financial decisions like loans and fraud detection, so fairness is essential.

sections.heading: What is Bias?
sections.text: Bias occurs when AI produces unfair results due to flawed or imbalanced data.

sections.heading: What is Privacy?
sections.text: Privacy concerns how personal data is collected, stored, and used in AI systems.

sections.heading: Regulation Example
sections.text: SEBI works on guidelines ensuring fair and transparent AI usage in the financial sector.
